articles.author: Madeleine Speed
articles.title: Unilever to slash a third of office jobs in Europe - Financial Times
articles.description: Shareholders including activist Nelson Peltz are pressuring consumer giant to boost growth
articles.content: Unilever plans to cut around a third of all office roles in Europe by the end of next year, as the companys new chief executive forges ahead with his plan to boost growth at the struggling consumer g… [+4468 chars]

articles.author: Peter Kafka
articles.title: Europe wants to fine Elon Musk over blue checks, which makes no sense - Business Insider
articles.description: Do we really want to live in a world where billionaires can't buy their favorite tech platform and  make it crappier? I didn't think so!
